Uses of Package
org.libex.test.mockito.answer

  • Packages that use org.libex.test.mockito.answer 
    Package Description
    org.libex.test.mockito.answer  
  • Classes in org.libex.test.mockito.answer used by org.libex.test.mockito.answer 
    Class and Description
    BarrierredAnswer
    A WrappedAnswer that if closed will block the mock invocation until opened.
    CountDownLatchAnswer
    A WrappedAnswer that allows a unit test to wait until the mock has been invoked a specified number of times.
    DelayedAnswer
    A WrappedAnswer that delays the response from the mock invocation by a specified amount of time.
    InstanceAnswer 
    ThrowingAnswer 
    WrappedAnswer
    Allows for wrapping an answer while adding behavior.
